name: UC-One Meet
description: *************************************************** Note: The application will only work in conjunction with a service provided by your service provider. Please contact your service provider for details. ***************************************************  UC-One Meet is an easy-to-use collaboration app that brings virtual teams together with video, voice, and screen sharing from any mobile and desktop device.   Meet provides a consistent experience across all BroadSoft Business applications providing a seamless and intuitive meeting experience for everyone in your company.  Key Features: Easy to join. Improve meeting start times One identity. Have one business identity across all services: voice, video and content sharing Access from any device. Start or join your collaboration session from desktop, laptop, smartphone or tablet Keep teams engaged with high quality voice and video Initiate screen share and view on desktop, tablet and smartphone One touch access with no dial-in numbers or codes Guest access. Invite external participants to join from any device Room management. Dismiss attendees, mute/unmute attendees
